lead_paragraph: Detroit signed forward Antonio McDyess to a two-year contract extension yesterday. McDyess, 32, overcame knee injuries to play in a career-high 82 games in each of the past two seasons with the Pistons. He has one season left on his current deal. He averaged 8.1 points, 6 rebounds and 21 minutes last season, making 53 percent of his shots.
